abstract: Siobhan Burke reviews United States premiere of Robin Orlin dance At the same time we were pointing a finger at you, we realized we were pointing three at ourselves, performed by Senagalese troupe Compagnie Jant-Bi at Montclair State University in New Jersey.
lead_paragraph: The South African artist Robyn Orlin and the dancers of Compagnie Jant-Bi explore issues surrounding gender and homophobia in African life, at Montclair State University.
snippet: The South African artist Robyn Orlin and the dancers of Compagnie Jant-Bi explore issues surrounding gender and homophobia in African life, at Montclair State University.

headline.main: Translating, if Not Analyzing, Gender Dynamics
headline.seo: Robyn Orlin and Compagnie Jant-Bi Evoke Senegalese Tradition
headline.print_headline: Translating, if Not Analyzing, Gender Dynamics
